Package mireka.filter.local

Contains filters which decide if a recipient is local and determine the necessary actions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptAllRecipient  
    AcceptDomainPostmaster  
    AcceptGlobalPostmaster  
    AcceptPostmaster  
    AcceptRecipient  
    LookupDestinationFilter
    The LookupDestination filter assigns a destination to recipients in the FilterBase.verifyRecipient(RecipientContext) phase.
    ProhibitRelaying
    This filter rejects recipient addresses of which remote part is not a local domain (or address literal).
    RefuseUnknownRecipient
    The RefuseUnknownRecipient filter rejects recipients whose destination has not been set (null) or whose destination is UnknownRecipientDestination.

Package mireka.filter.local Description

Contains filters which decide if a recipient is local and determine the necessary actions.
